sentences.sContent: Without a parent style, your action bar will be without many style properties unless you explicitly declare them yourself.
sentences.sContent_eng: Without a parent style, your action bar will be without many style properties unless you explicitly declare them yourself.
sentences.sCn: 如果没有父母样式化，你的操作栏将不很多样式属性，除非你明确自己声明它们。

sentences.sContent: It eliminates the need to specify recursion explicitly.
sentences.sContent_eng: It eliminates the need to specify recursion explicitly.
sentences.sCn: 它消除了明确地指定递归的需求。

words.tran: 明确的；清楚的；直率的；详述的
